creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Postcard with illustration of blue and white coulds floating beneath a colorful cloud featuring geometric designs and black lines pouring out of it like rain. On the rear there is an inscription in sharpie.
inscription: Verso, black sharpie: 4-2-06 / Dear Fly: / I saw your comix / when I was visiting / Billy in rehab - maybe / you can send something / in trade for these? / If not, no worries - / enjoy / MJB
title: Postcard: Gallery MJB
